name: Capeless Heroes
description:
A game from GameBlast16.

In this game, inspired by Hotline Miami, you must rush into a burning building to extinguish fires, rescue civilians and recover valuables before the integrity of the house causes it to collapse right on top of you!

Gameplay derives from the hit indie game; Hotline Miami. With a top-down view and the retro feel of crisp pixel graphics will hopefully come together to create a well-polished and highly-researched little indie game.
